gulp-starter (v1.3.5)

File processing boilerplate for Sass, JS, images and SVG files with Gulp.js & friends

3 steps

$ git clone https://github.com/marcop135/gulp-starter.git
$ npm install
$ gulp

gulp-imagemin test

This is a JPG image (the original size was 147KB)

This is a PNG image (original size: 287KB)

This is a GIF image (original size: 144KB)

This is a SVG image (original size: 269 bytes)
